column4: Hi all, unable to delete trash. checked permissions. where do i go to delete please. I do not know where ~is.
I have opened my home folder in file browser
home,root,parent,local/share/Trash? Sorry still new at this.
in your home directory, go to View --> show hidden files. you will then see a folder called .local
when I try to delete contents of trash it duplicates or reproduces itself??? virus?
if you press del, it moves the file to trash
do I delete the folders in trash called "files, info"? I was able to delete the contents
everything in the trash is safe to delete.
would you believe they were deleted but have now reappeared??
that is fine... those folders keep track of things...
I meant the files I deleted in the Trash magically reappeared. Wierd
I think I understand now they are only .ini files ThankYou
